reviewText: I was very pleased with this DVD of Lionel Richie's music. I remember watching most of these videos on certain cable stations that played nothing but videos at that time. The video of Dancing On The Ceiling was great. I remember them showing how they shot the video and most of the other songs listed. You don't see this type of music anymore. This is "Music." Not the kind they call music today. I guess talking the lyrics to some is music, not me. This is genuine music from the heart and inner being. This type music plus other songs are now being used for recent movies for their soundtracks. Makes you wonder, huh? You won't go wrong with this DVD, Sit back, turn down the lights, close your eyes and remember. Great DVD.
Title: N/A

reviewText: well, admiteddly, this product is ONLY for fans of 80ies music,... but I gotta say I always loved Lionel Richie, and a lot of his songs are really timeless. My personnal favorite will always be "Hello". In fact, I would place "Hello" as my favorite song of all time.this DVD brings you more than just the greatest songs by the man since you have the actual music videos.. And for a time where there were no computer graphics, some of those videos had pretty amazing effects (such as "Dancing on the Ceiling".Anyway, if you like good music and you like Lionel Richie, this DVD should be in your collection.

reviewText: I recently brought this DVD...and I fell in LOVE with it. My only regret is that I did not buy this sooner!!I have not seen these videos since the late '80s - early '90s, and they really had me reminiscing. Looking over this collection, it was plain to see why Lionel Richie was the one of the hottest pop acts of the 1980s, where his only competition was Michael Jackson and Prince - good musical company to be in!! Even though today many people may dismiss Lionel's material as being too pop-oriented, I have yet to come across one person who can honestly say that they never brought any of his music!This is like taking a trip through my late teens and early twenties all over again...I can remember all of these videos and being so moved by the "Hello" video, I had to cry. And I had the same reaction when I saw it again for the first time in God knows how many years!! The only videos I never really cared for were "Dancing On The Ceiling" (hey, I'm sorry!!) and "Penny Lover", but all the others are off the hook, especially "All Night Long" (where you see a young Lela Rochon-Fuqua dancing with Lionel), "Running With The Night" (this always reminded me of MJ's "Smooth Criminal" video), "Do It To Me" (I love this video...it is STEAMY, STEAMY, STEAMY!), "Se La" and "My Destiny". Also in the "Love, Oh Love" video, be on the lookout for a young Nicole Richie.The one mistake that was made with this collection was the omission of "My Love", one of my favorite Lionel solo songs...which can ONLY be seen if you have a DVD-ROM in your computer and you are hooked up to the web >:-( NOT FAIR!! That was the only thing that prevented me from giving this 5 stars. But other than that, this is an extremely enjoyable DVD. Yeah, as I watch it over and over again, it reminds me just why I love Lionel, and why I can't wait for his new CD to drop next month. For the Richie fan, this DVD is a MUST to own.

reviewText: even though this dvd was released a long time ago, i was recently informed by a friend Lionel had a greatest hits dvd, i rushed to my computer to order through amazon, this is a must have, all lionel's songs are great! no exceptions! he was and is a superstar.

reviewText: MR. RICHIE WAS BLESSED WITH A BEAUTIFUL VOICE. YOU CAN ACTUALLY FEEL THE PASSION AND LOVE AND WHATEVER OTHER EMOTION HE IS TRYING TO COME ACROSS WITH. ITS A GIFT. HE USES IT BEAUTIFULLY. THIS IS AS CLOSE TO A REAL CONCERT AS YOU CAN GET. IVE BEEN TO A FEW. THEY PUT THIS TOGETHER WELL. I WOULD LIKE TO GET MORE OF HIS WORK SOMEDAY. ALOT OF GOOD SONGS ON THIS COLLECTION.  EILEEN HINES
